root.name: FP_PRECISION
root.description:
FP_PRECISION is the number of bits reserved for the fractional part of a number in fixed point calculations. Currently, this constant has the value 8. To convert an integer to its fixed point representation, you can use either itofp() or simply shift the integer left by this value:
int value_fp = 25 << FP_PRECISION; // the fixed point representation of the number 25
